pkgmetadata.longdescription: # awprLibrary that helps an application report progress to Argo Workflows.## Installation ```shellpip install awpr```## UsageSet the environment variable and run your application:`ARGO_PROGRESS_FILE=/tmp/progress.txt````shellfrom awpr.awpr import ArgoWorkflowsProgressReporterawpr = ArgoWorkflowsProgressReporter()awpr.set_total_progress(100)awpr.start_reporting()awpr.set_current_progress(20)awpr.set_current_progress(30)awpr.get_progress_percent()awpr.set_progress_complete()awpr.get_progress_percent()```
